summary: "Taxi" is an American TV comedy series that aired from 1978 to 1983. It follows New York City taxi drivers and their tough dispatcher. The main characters include Alex, Bobby, Elaine, Tony, Jim, Louie, and Latka, played by actors like Judd Hirsch and Danny DeVito. Created by experienced TV producers, "Taxi" was very popular and won many awards, including three years in a row for Best Comedy Series at the Emmys. People still enjoy watching it today.
title: Taxi (TV series)
